about_the_game:
The DEMO version of Helping Ani.

HELPING ANI is an psychological-horror game, where you play as Hajime, a boy who has to take something to his girlfriend, Ani. But be careful, the forest will be full of strange and curious foes!

It's a short demo, it WILL change for the final product.

content_descriptors.notes: There are descriptions and representations of self-harming, suicide, drug use and nudity. Everything is drawn.

name: Helping Ani Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Sound Card: No
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: (^~^)/
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Sound Card: No
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: (^~^)/
